result.arabic_text: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا لُّدّٗا
result.translation: Mu by’ukuri (Qur’an) twayoroheje gusobanuka mu rurimi rwawe (yewe Muhamadi) kugira ngo uyikoreshe ugeza inkuru nziza ku bagandukira (Allah), ndetse unayikoreshe uburira abantu (b’abahakanyi) bagira izima.
